SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
Class that represents the main class for a client-server application using RMI communication.
AppClient
Class that represents the main class for a client application using RMI communication.
AppServer
Class that represents the main class for a server application using RMI communication.
Bag
Class that represents the bag of slots, ordered by color.
CGDecreaseTiles
Class that represents the common goal card achievable filling five columns of increasing or decreasing height with tiles of any color.
CGEightTilesSameType
Class that represents the common goal card achievable inserting eight tiles of the same color in any slot of the shelf.
CGFiveTilesDiagonal
Class that represents the common goal card achievable inserting five tiles of the same type forming a diagonal line.
CGFiveTilesX
Class that represents the common goal card achievable inserting five tiles of the same color forming an X.
CGFourCorners
Class that represents the common goal card achievable inserting four tiles of the same color in the four corners of the bookshelf.
CGFourGroupsFourTiles
Class that represents the common goal card achievable inserting four groups each containing at least four tiles of the same color not necessarily in the depicted shape.
CGFourLinesFiveTiles
Class that represents the common goal card achievable filling our lines each formed by five tiles of maximum three different colors.
CGOnColumn
Class that represents a generic common goal card that requires a particular columns configuration to be achieved.
CGOnLines
Class that represents a generic common goal card that requires a particular rows configuration to be achieved.
CGSameTypeSquare
Class that represents the common goal card achievable inserting two groups each containing four tiles of the same type in a 2x2 square.
CGSixGroupsTwoTiles
Class that represents the common goal card achievable inserting six groups each containing at least two tiles of the same color.
CGThreeColumnsSixTiles
Class that represents the common goal card achievable filling three columns each formed by 6 tiles of maximum three different colors.
CGTwoColumnsSixTiles
Class that represents the common goal card achievable filling two columns each formed by 6 different colors of tiles.
CGTwoLinesFiveTiles
Class that represents the common goal card achievable filling two rows each formed by 5 different colors of tiles.
Client
Class that represents a client that interacts with a remote server using RMI (Remote Method Invocation).
ClientRMIInterface
This interface defines the client-side application methods that can be invoked on a remote object using RMI.
Color
Enum that represents the color of a slot.
ColorPrint
Class that represents the code strings to print colorized details.
CommonGoalAbs
Class that represents a generic common goal card that each player can achieve.
CommonGoalDeck
Class that represents the deck that contains the common goal cards.
crashPreGame
Class that manages that notifies the logged players that a client crashed in the pre game phase.
Dashboard
Class that represents the game dashboard.
Game
Class that represents the model of the game and manages the match events flow.
GameController
Class that represents the controller of the game, it checks the input from the user interface and modifies the model of the game.
GameError
Enum that represents the errors occurred during the game.
GameEventListener
The interface that represents a listener of the events occurred in the model.
GameInterface
Class that represents the textual user interface.
GameState
Enum that represents the current stage of the game (and the turn).
GameView
Class that represents the current view of the game.
Image
Class that represents the image on a tile.
insertThread
Class that manages the insert phase of the turn.
NotAdjacentSlotsException
Class that represents a customized exception thrown when a player selects not adjacent slots.
NotCatchableException
Class that represents a customized exception thrown when a player selects one (or more) not catchable slots.
NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException
Class that represents a customized exception thrown when a player wants to select too much slots (according to the space in his shelf and the slot's configuration on the dashboard).
OrderChoice
Class that represents the order of insertion of the tiles selected compared to the order of selection in a triple selection,in a double selection the attributes are all initialized as 1.
PersonalGoal
Clas that represents a personal goal card that a player can achieve.
PersonalGoalDeck
Class that represents the deck that contains the personal goal cards.
PersonalShelf
Class that represents the personal shelf associated to a player.
Player
Class that represents the player enrolled to the game.
SameNicknameException
Class that represents a customized exception thrown when a player choices a nickname already in use.
ServerImpl
Class that represents a server that interacts with a remote client using RMI (Remote Method Invocation).
ServerRMIInterface
This interface defines the server-side application methods that can be invoked on a remote object using RMI.
Slot
Class that represents a tile or an empty cell of the dashboard or a personal shelf.
SlotChoice
Class that represents the tiles selected from the dashboard by the player in order of selection.
Target
Class that represents one of the set of slots to fill to pursue a personal goal.
turnThread
Class that manages the selection and the order phase of the turn.
Type
Enum that represents the type of the image on slots with the same colour.
viewListeners
The interface that represents a listener of the events occurred in the view.
